item.description:
Finally, a Patriots viewing party just for singles!

Who likes football? Come out to Lir on Sunday, October 21st to watch the Patriots ground the Jets and meet some of Boston's most eligible football fans at the same time!

Boston Singles is coming too!
http://www.meetup.com/BostonSingles/

Lir has $3 Rolling Rocks and starting at 4 PM, a $4 Menu items, including wings, jalapeño poppers, spring rolls, crab rangoons, waffle fries, cheese & pepperoni pizzas, Buffalo chicken sliders and hamburger sliders. All for $4 each. Good deal if you ask me. :D

I am asking for a $1 fee at the door for setting this up, because it costs me money to travel into Boston on the commuter rail and the T to host events.

Parking for the Event:

Street parking is possible and generally easy to find around this time. Keep in mind the meters are NOT running on Sunday.

Taking The T:

The closest stop in Hynes Convention Center on the B, C & D Green Lines, which is 2 blocks away.

There are parking garages around, but they are expensive.

See you there!

~Matt
item.how_to_find_us: We're downstairs. Find the spiral staircase to the right just after you walk in the door on the first floor.
item.name: Pats vs. Jets - Viewing Party For Singles!
